segments.text: Have you had enough time to look over the menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are almost ready to order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me remind you of the specials of the day , which are posted on the board .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that all sounds so good ! Can we get the sauce on the side ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we would be happy to prepare the food to meet your special needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was wondering if you have any vegetarian choices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the roasted vegetable salad is good , and the portabella mushroom burger is also a good choice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that I would like to order the broccoli noodles , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is an excellent choice , and I could bring you your salads now or bring them with your dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please bring our salads to us now . We are hungry !
segments.speaker: S2
